page.title: 19Anston Brook Junior School
page.content: The{Junior school}opened in 1908. Mr.G.Crank started as headteacher in September 1978. There are 200 children in 8 classes, 2 classes of mixed ability in each age group. There are 8 teachers and 1 part-time teacher. Teachers also come to our school to teach violin and guitar. The lessons we do are mathematics, writing, reading, painting, drawing and modelling. We write about the local environment also about journeys and educational visits to places such as the coast, a city or a local farm. Recently we have visited Filey, Rotherham library and the Chesterfield canal. School starts at 9.00 am. and finishes at 3.45 pm. Playtimes are from 10.30 to 10.45 am. and 2.30 to 2.45 pm. Once you finish in this school when you are 11 years old you go to{Dinnington Comprehensive School.
